• Web-based multiplayer mining game with real-time voxel world and physics.
  • Supports both desktop (keyboard/mouse) and mobile (touch controls) gameplay.
  • Features persistent progression, upgrade system, and procedurally generated maps.
  • Implements server discovery, admin controls, and cloud save synchronization.
  • Includes chat, trading, teleportation, and explosive mechanics.
    const TILE_TYPES = { EMPTY: 0, DIRT: 1, COAL: 6, IRON: 7, GOLD: 8, DIAMOND: 9 };
    const CONSTANTS = { MAP_WIDTH: 1000, MAP_HEIGHT: 2000, TILE_SIZE: 32 };

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time voxel world exploration, resource gathering, and player progression. The game supports both desktop and mobile controls, includes a comprehensive upgrade system, and implements server discovery with cloud save synchronization. Players can mine various resources, trade with others, and build structures while managing fuel, health, and cargo capacity.
